aboutMe:
Hi, My name is Muhammad Rido
You can call me Rido, Ido, Edo, and anything

I have experience as Backend and Fullstack Developer since 2020 to develop web applications. I currently working at IT company on Tangerang regency. I love exploring everything related to technology. I have skills and currently learning some skills like: Golang, Java, Javascript (React Js), Linux, Databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Elasticsearch), Kafka, Redis, Docker, HTML, and CSS
